import { ElevateViewImage } from "/src/components/Images";


# Elevate View
Elevate View allow user to create container view with elevation.

<div style={{backgroundColor: 'white',border: '1px solid #F4F6F8', borderRadius: 16, padding: 32, marginBottom: 24}}>
   <ElevateViewImage />
</div>

### Low Elevation
```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.ElevateViewAV
		android:layout_width="wrap_content"
		android:layout_height="wrap_content"
		app:cardCornerRadius="8dp"
		app:elevationType="low" />
```
<br/><br/>

### High Elevation
```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.ElevateViewAV
		android:layout_width="wrap_content"
		android:layout_height="wrap_content"
		app:cardCornerRadius="8dp"
		app:elevationType="high" />
```
